content:
Absolutely! The decision to incorporate mods into the base game ultimately rests with the developers. However, players have a significant impact on which mods become popular and which ones are worth considering. Player feedback, reviews, and suggestions can all play a role in guiding developers towards which mods to incorporate into the base game.

At the same time, players have the freedom to choose which mods to use to customize their gameplay experience. Mods can add new and exciting features, fix bugs, and improve the graphics or performance of the game. It's up to players to decide which mods they want to use to tailor their gaming experience to their preferences.
